original: Johanson, Carl Gustaf Hialmar Valfrid, direktör, Sandared, f. 25/11/88 i Örby, Älvsb. 1., av Karl J. o. Augusta Pettersson. G, 14 m. Bärna Rehn. Barn: Björn f. 15, Per 17, Bengt 20, Ulla 22. — Realex. 04. Anst. v. Wis-kastrands Wäfveri A-B 05-16, disp. v. Linne Industri A-B 16-31, grund, av o. verkst. dir. f. A-B Libo Konfektion i Borås 32. Medl. av Par Bricole.
translated: Johanson, Carl Gustaf Hialmar Valfrid, director, Sandared, b. 25/11/88 in Örby, Älvsborgs län, son of Karl J. and Augusta Pettersson. Married for 14 years to Bärna Rehn. Children: Björn b. 15, Per b. 17, Bengt b. 20, Ulla b. 22. Completed secondary school in 1904. Employed by Wis-kastrand's Weaving Company Ltd. from 1905-1916, then served as a manager at Linne Industri AB from 1916-1931, and finally founded and served as managing director for AB Libo Clothing in Borås in 1932. Member of the Par Bricole society.
